name: Wmii

# Introduction #

## Installation ##

Check if the package management of your operating system already provides a package for the latest wmii snapshot and install this, or build wmii from scratch after [downloading](https://code.google.com/p/wmii/source/checkout) the source. If you build it from scratch, follow the instructions in the shipped README file.

## Running wmii ##

Add the following line to your `.xinitrc` to start `wmii` using 

```
until wmii; do
    true
done
```

In order to connect wmii to a specific display, make sure that the `$DISPLAY` environment variable is set correctly. For example:

```
DISPLAY=:1 wmii
```
